rules.description: fromD Use Command+D to focus address bar in Firefox
control space to command space - spotlight
disable command shift semi colon in iterm
iTerm Change Option + h/j/k/l to Arrows
control command R to command shift R
iterm command g to option g
iterm vim move split position H
iterm vim move split position J
iterm vim move split position K
iterm vim move split position L
fromK - iterm vim cmd opt K to ctrl u
